charges.charge_description: 18:2252A(a)(2) RECEIPT OF CHILD PORNOGRAPHY WITH A PREVIOUS CONVICTION(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to count III of the Indictment and was committed to the custody of Bureau of Prisons for 204 months; 17 years supervised release with special conditions; $100 Special Assessment.
Counts I, II, IV, and V of the Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States.
